channel.title: Chat Box
channel.description: Hey guys just wanted to ask how to change my chat if theres a way ... like when regular players type its yellow but if owners type its like glow but also shows it glowed on the chat box is it possible? im pretty new at coding so yeh if u can tell me wat to do that would be great thx. =]

item.title: Chat Box
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Alright, I can help you with in the chat box, but not with over head (right now) I’ve never messed with over head chat.

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:6, topic:406684”][quote author=ExtremeX-Scape™ link=topic=503682.msg3685021#msg3685021 date=1311790486]
You asked if it’s possible, I answered.
[/quote]Your the worst troll I have ever met, all you do is go around to random topics posting random shit and not helping anyone at all. isn’t it obvious that if he comes here and asks the question hes going to need some help doing it?[/quote]

He didn’t straight forward ask for help, in the section rule’s you have to be specific I will stop being a dick now and actually help

Read full topic

item.title: Chat Box

item.description:
@xxbanditxx wrote:

[quote=“escalation, post:5, topic:406684”]Do you mean a yell system? or like…

in the chatbox or the over-head text… be more specific.[quote author=ExtremeX-Scape™ link=topic=503682.msg3685021#msg3685021 date=1311790486]
You asked if it’s possible, I answered.
[/quote]

He said “…how to change my chat…” usually that is answered with a solution.[/quote]
like u know how u make it cyan: hey and on top of ur head its blue? i want it like that so when owners talks it blue BUT ALSO it shows it in chat box blue aswell cause with cyan it just shows blue on top of ur head and in chat box its still yellow … can u give me the code for that?

Read full topic
